analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/34/0x22bdbc118e5fb0bf0d9f059679ae22770b7da1b5.sol:
	Contract KopexExchange has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/34/0x22bdbc118e5fb0bf0d9f059679ae22770b7da1b5.sol#221-227)
	 - exchangeToken (/unique_chucks/34/0x22bdbc118e5fb0bf0d9f059679ae22770b7da1b5.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

KopexExchange.exchangeToken (/unique_chucks/34/0x22bdbc118e5fb0bf0d9f059679ae22770b7da1b5.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.transfer(_buyer,amount) (/unique_chucks/34/0x22bdbc118e5fb0bf0d9f059679ae22770b7da1b5.sol)
HumanStandardToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/34/0x22bdbc118e5fb0bf0d9f059679ae22770b7da1b5.sol#135)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/34/0x22bdbc118e5fb0bf0d9f059679ae22770b7da1b5.sol#125:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
